label: AB6C8_hR15_148_a_f_cf-001
title: BaMo$_{6}$S$_{8}$ Structure
comments:
BaMo$_{6}$S$_{8}$ and other Chevrel phase compounds undergo structural transitions at low temperatures.  BaMo$_{6}$S$_{8}$ transforms into a triclinic $P\overline{1}$ structure below 175K.  Structural parameters for the low temperature phase can be found in (Kubel, 1990).  We use the data for the rhombohedral $R\overline{3}$ structure taken at 177K. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
